title: S9E024 – "Spiritual Presents" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
'Tis the Season, and for THIS Season 9 finale, Otis brings a bag of Christmas creeps by various authors. In the first, a cracked skull due to a mishap leads to being able to a psychic gift and discoveries about people's darker habits. In the second, an EMT working on Christmas deals with his own inner demons. Following these, as a bonus, Otis takes a short detour into more well-known territory with a reading of "'Twas the Night Before Christmas."

To watch the podcast on YouTube: http://bit.ly/ChillingEntertainmentYT


Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast


If you like the show, telling a friend about it would be amazing! You can text, email, Tweet, or send this link to a friend: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
